content.title: Wow, 100% Funded in Four Days!
content.creator:
Matthew Zamora
February 21, 2025
content.content:
Our team is so thankful to all of the supporters of DIY tech and FPGA education! We know that FPGAs have such a broad and exciting application in hobbyist and creative electronics. 

We are committed to supporting and being leaders in the FPGA educational space, particularly helping makers and those new to these devices.
Our team is full steam ahead on creating some new and exciting demos and educational content to support the Fipsy devices. But we wanted to take a moment to thank our supporters. 

Please spread the word about our project to help more beginners discover and take on this otherwise challenging and obscure topic. FPGAs can become any kind of digital logic circuit, and electrical engineers use them all over the place to allow for flexibility in designs, or to develop custom and highly efficient algorithms.
Stay tuned for more announcements from our team, and thank you again to all of the Fipsy V2 backers!
